entry.title: Eucalyptus Foaming Body Sugar Scrub
entry.summary:
Vendor: LNA Beauty
Type:
Price: 1.50 - 5.20 (3 variants)

Bath and Body Works Fragrance

We also offer our squeeze tube whipped body butters on a separate listing, to avoid having to stick your fingers in the container and dig it out.  Also provides another step of sanitary  :-)

We offer 4 sizes.  

.7oz sample

2oz container

4 oz container

Sugar scrubs are a great foaming scrub which will help with exfoliating skin. This foaming scrub when applied gently will help shed the bad skin which will help keep your skin clean and smooth but also will make you smell good

Our body butters go a long ways with a small amount.  We recommend using as soon as you are out of the shower to allow the butters to soak in immediately.

Ingredients consist of all organic products as follows:

Foaming Soap

Organic Sugar

Jojoa Oil

Vitamin E

Glycerin

Grapeseed Oil

Mica Powder

Fragrance Oils

Disclaimer***We suggest always start by using a patch test of our product on your arm in case of a reaction.  We do not recommend putting these products on your face, especially if you have acne prone skin, or sensitive skin.  

LNA Beauty, LLC is not responsible for any reactions of our product.  Please beaware of all product ingredients that you are using to your own knowledge.

entry.title: Body Scrub Squeeze Tube
entry.summary:
Vendor: LNA Beauty
Type:
Price: 6.50

Tired of sticking your fingers in your container to get your body butter out?  Want to add another measure of sanitary to your skin care WITHOUT adding a preservative chemical?  These tubes are the PERFECT way to do so.  Easy Squeeze with perfect consistency that comes out perfect, and PERFECT for traveling

All squeeze tubes come in a solid color.

Choose from fragrance below in the drop down menu.

These come are 5oz Containers
